A '''potion of Strength''' is a [[potion]] that provides [[Strength]] when used.

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Blaze Powder
|base = Awkward Potion
|Potion of Strength
|showvariants=1
}}

|name = Potion of Strength +
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing

|base = Potion of Strength
|Potion of Strength Enhanced
|name = Potion of Strength II
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing

|base2=Potion of Strength
|base1=Potion of Strength Extended
|base3= Potion of Strength Enhanced

{{Brewing

|foot=1
}}

=== Base potion ===
The [[potion]] of [[Strength]] is a base for brewing [[potions of Weakness]].

{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Strength
|Potion of Weakness
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Strength Extended
|Potion of Weakness Extended
|name = [[Potion of Weakness]]+
|ingredients = [[Fermented Spider Eye]] +<br> '''Potion of Strength+'''
|showvariants=1
|foot = 1
}}
